rComments: He's not a good teacher and did not provide me with any sort of assistance beyond being prompt with responses to emails I occasionally sent him.  He couldn't have been a worse professor unless he'd not come to class at all.

I had him for Earthquakes. It was his first time teaching as a professor. He was very prepared when it came to lectures, which was good. He posted the lectures on eCommons and did everything in his power to make sure everyone had a great learning experience. I personally did not like the material, but found him to be an intriguing, loving character
